Title: Requires members of a public body to complete a minimum level of training on the state's open meetings law and freedom of information law
Summary: Requires members of a public body to complete a minimum of two hours of training, with one hour on the state's open meetings law and one hour on freedom of information law; requires certain local, city, county, town and village public body members to complete such training as well.
LawCode: Add ยง79-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring members of a public body to complete a minimum level of training on the state's open meetings law and freedom of information law
